ai-ya7.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-ya7.1:2.1_0: The underlying tendencies of sensual desire, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-ya7.1:3.1_0: Wherein is the underlying tendencies of sensual desire for sensual pleasures? The underlying tendency to sensual desire for sensual pleasures?
ai-ya7.1:4.1_0: Wherein is the underlying tendency to repulsion towards painful feeling?
ai-ya7.1:5.1_0: Wherein is the underlying tendency to conceit?
ai-ya7.1:5.1_1: The underlying tendencies of sensual pleasures, in the form element, the formless realm.
ai-ya7.1:6.1_0: Wherein is the underlying tendency to all seen?
ai-ya7.1:7.1_0: Wherein is the underlying tendency to uncertainty regarding all things?
ai-ya7.1:8.1_0: Wherein is the underlying tendency to passion for continuation?
ai-ya7.1:9.1_0: Wherein is the underlying tendency to ignorance underlies that underlying tendency to ignorance?
